Title: Sarkar
Writer: Jayamohan (dialogue), A.R. Murugadoss (dialogue), A.R. Murugadoss (screenplay), A.R. Murugadoss (story), Thirukumaran
Actors: Joseph Vijay, Keerthi Suresh, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, Roger Julian Cross
Plot: A successful businessman gets involved in a political battle with 2 notorious ministers regarding the well being of fishermen in Tamil Nadu.
